globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com https://s.ytimg.com https://*.youtube.com; script-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://s.ytimg.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://i.ytimg.com https://*.ytimg.com; media-src 'self';
